description: Using nova-manage it's possible to disable a service. It should be possible to remove a service completely as well.
title: nova-manage should be able to delete a service

comments.content: Using nova-manage it's possible to disable a service. It should be possible to remove a service completely as well.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~adri2000

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/31059
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: The patch was abandoned, and I think there was actually a blueprint or change related to this in the API layer in Icehouse, but would have to dig to find it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
The blueprint merged in Icehouse for the API extension to delete a service:

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/remove-nova-compute
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
